title: Read data of a User
name: GetUser

permission.name: admin
permission.title: Admin access rights needed.
permission.description:
Optionally you can write here further Informations about the permission.

An "apiDefinePermission"-block can have an "apiVersion", so you can attach the block to a specific version.

description: Compare Verison 0.3.0 with 0.2.0 and you will see the green markers with new items in version 0.3.0 and red markers with removed items since 0.2.0.

Error 4xx.description: Only authenticated Admins can access the data.
The id of the User was not found.

title: Read data of a User
name: GetUser

permission.name: admin
permission.title: This title is visible in version 0.1.0 and 0.2.0

description: Here you can describe the function. Multilines are possible.

Error 4xx.description: The id of the User was not found.

title: Read data of a User
name: GetUser

permission.name: admin
permission.title: This title is visible in version 0.1.0 and 0.2.0

description: Here you can describe the function. Multilines are possible.

title: Create a new User
name: PostUser
description: In this case "apiErrorStructure" is defined and used. Define blocks with params that will be used in several functions, so you dont have to rewrite them.

Error 4xx.description: Only authenticated Admins can access the data.

title: Create a User
name: PostUser
description: In this case "apiErrorStructure" is defined and used. Define blocks with params that will be used in several functions, so you dont have to rewrite them.

Error 4xx.description: Only authenticated Admins can access the data.

title: Change a User
name: PutUser
description: This function has same errors like POST /user, but errors not defined again, they were included with "apiErrorStructure"

Error 4xx.description: Only authenticated Admins can access the data.
